name: Spaceman Defender
description:
A New Retro Classic Defender Arcade Game!

Defend these Little Spaceman Dudes from Aliens!

Blast your way through waves of Alien Abductors and UFOs while defending Spaceman Dudes from being abducted in this fast paced 80’s style modern remake.

FEATURES

- A Modern Version of an Arcade Classic.
- 50 Challenging Levels.
- Waves of Alien Abductors and UFOs.
- Spaceman Dudes that will THANK YOU!
- Arcade High Scores.
- Gamepad Support.


In Space, no one can hear the Little Spaceman Dudes scream… Except YOU!
